metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16018 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in payments in Google Chrome prior to 87.0.4280.66 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyperform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
